intro: Mentzelia gracilenta, commonly known as slender mentzelia, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States. It is a herbaceous annual that typically grows in arid or semi-arid environments. The plant features slender, branching stems and small, lance-shaped leaves. Its flowers are usually pale yellow to greenish-yellow and are arranged in clusters. Mentzelia gracilenta is characterized by its delicate appearance and is often found in disturbed soils or open habitats.
